Container.Name: GitLab CE
Container.Overview: gitlab/gitlab-ce[br][br] GitLab Community Edition is a software development collaboration tool.[br][br] This software let's you commit and pull changes from a shared repository.[br][br] After you setup the server, repository will be available at the address [br][br] [br][br] [br][br] Features:[br][br] * [br][br] * [br][br] * [br][br] * [br][br] [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']DO THIS BEFORE DEPLOYING THE TEMPLATE[br][br] [/span] Docker run Example:[br] docker run --detach \ --hostname gitlab.example.com \ --publish 443:443 --publish 80:80 --publish 22:22 \ --name gitlab \ --restart always \ --volume /srv/gitlab/config:/etc/gitlab \ --volume /srv/gitlab/logs:/var/log/gitlab \ --volume /srv/gitlab/data:/var/opt/gitlab \ gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest
